alert.note: Alert for East Glacier Park Region; Eastern Glacier, Western Toole, and Central Pondera; Northern High Plains; Southern High Plains; Southern Rocky Mountain Front (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Wind Watch issued December 23 at 2:05AM MST until December 25 at 12:00PM MST by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WATCH NOW IN EFFECT FROM SATURDAY AFTERNOON THROUGH SUNDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Southwest winds 35 to 55 mph, with gusts up to 75 mph, are possible. Localized gusts to 90 mph are possible in wind prone locations along the immediate eastern slopes of the Rocky Mountain Front. * WHERE...The Rocky Mountain Front and adjacent foothills and plains, and Eastern Glacier, Western Toole, and Central Pondera. * WHEN...From Saturday afternoon through Sunday morning. * IMPACTS...Travel could be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. Blowing snow could cause whiteout conditions, and drifting snow could lead to lane blockages. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Travel will be especially hazardous from Saturday evening through early Sunday morning when winds are expected to be the strongest.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts and warnings for updates.
